meanings.sent1: Her emprizes in the school play amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The explorer's emprizes led to the discovery of a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent3: The cat's emprizes to catch the laser pointer entertained the whole family.
meanings.sent4: His emprizes in the business world made him a legend among entrepreneurs.
meanings.sent5: The knight's emprizes to rescue the princess from the dragon were celebrated far and wide.

meanings.definition: To undertake a bold or daring action
meanings.sent1: She emprizes to climb the highest mountain in the world.
meanings.sent2: He emprizes to start his own company despite the risks.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel emprizes to steal nuts from the bird feeder every day.
meanings.sent4: The superhero emprizes to save the city from the evil villain.
meanings.sent5: The student emprizes to ace the difficult exam with hard work and dedication.
